name: Hope Staunches
text: We love Blaze Pizza! I always get their cauliflower crust and it's the best! We especially love to be able to choose our own toppings. Pizza is always done perfectly. Staff is always friendly. My husband loves using the app to get points and free stuff.

name: Mallorie Dailey
text:
First time here. I got the build your own
pizza- red spicy sauce,  Italian sausage,  pepperoni and Applewood bacon with buffalo sauce and ranch as a finisher. Great pizza! The dough knots were alright ‚Ä¶More

name: Zoey Varin
text: Ordered online, when I arrived my order was not ready and I was told I ‚Äúmust‚Äôve ordered to a location down the street‚Äù. Had to go back out to my car to get my phone and show them the email proving I ordered to the correct location. Then had ‚Ä¶More

name: Mitchell Brooks
text: For the price of the Pizza it was great. It's not a premium pie by any means but it's far from being a bad pie. The toppings are fresh and plentiful and of good, high quality. The dough is thin and I am guessing they will leave it in for ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristen Michaud
text: I really love their create your own gluten free pizza. I highly recomend. I gave it 4stars because if you call for take out its left on a rack where anyone can pick it up...wierd...and there is no heat lamp. So if you don't pick it up asap you have to reheat your pizza at home.

name: Nate Shull
text: Great personal pizza. Plenty of choices for toppings. Custom pizza orders in minutes. Nice atmosphere. The staff was attentive and courteous!

name: kelly macfarlane
text: Best pizza around. BUT.....As I was waiting for my order a young man arrived wearing NO. mask and was allowed to order AT THE FOOD COUNTER! He was NOT 6 feet apart from anyone!!üò° As I work in healthcare with the elderly I had to ask a ‚Ä¶More

name: Dan Ferro
text: Went here yesterday for lunch. First visit. You walk down a line, pick your dough, sauce, cheese, toppings, salad, etc. Then they send it to the oven operator. My wife had a half pizza, thin crust. I had whole pizza thick crust (2 doughs ‚Ä¶More

name: Dana Caswell
text: I‚Äôd give them 5 stars just for the taste of their pizzas, but the service was just that bad and slow that I can‚Äôt give higher than 2. Everyone working there looked absolutely miserable. Put my order in for ASAP, wasn‚Äôt ready until 50 ‚Ä¶More

name: Landon Brimmer
text: Sometimes the pizza is cooked fast and to hot so it taste a little weird but other then that amazing.

name: timothy abbott
text: You can really load up your pizza with toppings at this place. And the thin crispy crust is delicious. I have to say I enjoy blaze Pizza over any other commercial pizza chain in the area because of the flavor and toppings. Even compared to ‚Ä¶More

name: Shannon S
text: Customer service was very good I did build your own pizza I don't care for there tomato sauce so I always get pesto smeared all over the pizza, crust and all. Pizza came out great and we tried something new it was like a garlic knot with pesto and cheese my 6-year-old loved it

name: Ethan Berg
text: Tasty food always, friendly staff, Ryan went above and beyond. Highly recommend going here.

name: Justin Campney
text: A good pizza option for those that have an individual topping preference for their pizzas.  Gluten free and keto crust options along with a large variety of toppings for a make your own option. It is a quick and tasty option for an eat in ‚Ä¶More

name: Merissa Gauthier
text: I've always been a fan of Blaze, but they now have Keto crust options (not for me, personally, but I know it's a big thing) but their drink lids I LOVE due to straw elimination....

name: Tiffany Otten
text: Generally very pleasant, affordable, and tasty. They have an app you can use to order if staying in, and you can accrue rewards for free stuff. Used to be a lot of issues when they started but they seem to have worked most out.

name: Sumit Munshi
text: great service, had a problem with delivery... wasn't their fault, but they remade the order and even refunded me in full.  Amazing, thank you

name: Phillip Riddick Jr.
text: Always love, love, LOVE Blaze! Service and food always on point. Wait time low and clean facilities. Multiple options for people of specific dietary needs and always ask if there is a need to change their gloves for allergy concerns. Highly recommend.

name: Nicole B
text: Earn points using the App. Pizzas will fill you up, lots of different options and always pretty quick to be made. The gluten free dough Is really good also!

name: Kevin B.
text: It's blaze. Never had a bad experience.

name: Shyn3
text: They have keto and cauliflower crust pizzas. Nuff said...

name: Ch Cha
text: Good. The people are really friendly each time I visited, it‚Äôs always the same friendly crew and the pizzas are not bad. Haven‚Äôt try other stuff on the menu.

name: mahalia hills
text: this is the place to go if you're looking for great food.

name: Eric J Zach
text: The pizzas fine. Kinda conservative with the toppings, but the real kicker is the really nice speakers hooked up to someone's ghetto phone humming louder than the rest of the the room. I would say it's a little uninviting when I have to scream over feedback to have a conversation.

name: Petra Holden
text: interesting concept for a pizza place, it's like Chipotle where you can choose your personal pizza, and then your own toppings that are laid out in a salad bar like setting. The toppings are high-quality, and they include some excellent ‚Ä¶More

name: MIKE TRAINER
text: Terrible service and very unhygienic workers. Young and ignorant post high school kids the are not at all professional of informed on cleanliness.

name: Jonny Reed
text: My wife and I went for dinner on a Friday night. They seem to have a bunch to offer for those with dairy allergies, vegan, etc. which is the category my wife fits into. Unfortunately I was the only one who was able to eat something since ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh M
text: Awesome pizza and service! Loved the cauliflower crust. The employees I dealt with during my visit were very friendly and helpful. Hoping we get one of these closer to me, in Saratoga!

name: Dean Powell
text: Been to this Blaze a dozen times and the staff is always very froendly and the food is great., including several types of gluten free crusts.

name: Jordan Linn
text: Fantastic place! Employees are friendly and are eager to answer any questions you may have. Food is fantastic. Not too heavy and not too light. Its perfect.

name: Tanya Lewis
text: LOVE! Super fast service, clean and lots of options. The staff was really Friendly and was having fun. We love there is a vegan options for us with dairy issues.

name: Charles Showalter
text: Excellent pizza. They use fresh ingredients, right in front of you. Portion was just right. I got the salad and half pizza. You can get a much toppings on your pizza as you want. They offer soda with cane sugar rather than corn syrup. The decor is a little cold and industrial though. I prefer a more cozy atmosphere.

name: Christopher Cook
text: Have a good thing going very well done guys thumbs up in my book

name: Josh Mitchell
text: I love this place, they make delicious pizza (especially gluten-free, which I need), and their customer service is good. However, I have had most of my orders made with some kind of mistake. I don't know if it's the volume of customers or ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Keal
text: If you're looking for a quick fresh pizza, this place is great. They have lots of excellent toppings and the the end result tastes great. I recommend starting off with a signature pizza and then, after you have experienced the process, order a custom tailored pizza just the way you like.

name: Dan Curry
text:
Very friendly staff, and delicious!
‚ÄúMax‚Äù ‚ÄúLondon‚Äù and ‚ÄúDoll Face‚Äù were very nice and helped me with my first experience at Blaze. I will return! ‚Ä¶More

name: Cathy Laurent
text: Great pizza options with super fresh ingredients! Love that you can pile on ingredients without jacking up the price. The thin crust was perfect - held up under the weight of many ingredients.

name: Nicholas Smith
text: Keto crust is so delicious, and spicy red sauce is my shhhh.  Always ready in a hurry, and staff stays with a smile

name: Louis Torres
text: You'll love it a ton!! Such amazing pizza and for a little more, you can customize it any way you'd like and it's worth it. The pizza is always handed to you hyper fast and you go!

name: Nosaj Trebor
text: Awesome, build your own pizza. Different every visit. Fresh and delicious.

name: Josh Chiera
text: Pretty good fired pizza. Orders come our really quick and the ingredients always taste fresh. The staff here are usually very cheerful and I have yet to have a bad experience. Pretty reasonable prices as well.

name: Amy Seeley
text: Keto pizza!! What is not to love?

name: Connie Reynolds
text: Absolutely love this place. Here you truly can have your pizza your way. Fresh local produce is a staple in this restaurant.  They offer gluten free, thick and thin crust options.  The price is very reasonable.  Expect to spend $10 per person on average. From order to receiving your pizza is about 10 minutes.  Enjoy!

name: Brad Ruggles
text: Fast fresh and worth skipping delivery from other joints. A bit busy so no judgmental on cross ingredients on my pie. Those who have food allergies should check there pie. But the za is to die for!

name: Kirstie C
text: Blaze is always great because you can add toppings to your heart's content. The service here was fast and the pizzas were delicious.

name: Devavrat Jivani
text: Burnt pick up order. They don‚Äôt look at the pizza before putting it in a box! It was burnt!

name: Joseph Padin

text: Kids and I love this place. It's our new favorite pizza joint

name: Rob Smith
text: Food is great and quick. Prices are very good.

name: Leo D
text: If you like something that tastes like dog food on a crust then this is the place for you! Expensive for what you get and every meat topping tastes the same. Much like Subway in that you can't tell what kind of meat you're eating, you just have to take their word for it.

name: John Fredericks
text: Quick good pizza made to order with a plethora of options

name: Michael Burke

name: Mark Ray
text: Awesome make it the way you want it thin crust pizza.  They make them fast so you don't wait long.  We go weekly.

name: Faith Battaglia
text: First time there and last time there!! Very disappointed!! You don't get enough food for a mouse. The customer service was pretty much do it your self. Wow- not good!!

name: Mark C
text: Definitely the best blaze I've been to! Cooked the gluten free pizza so it was actually a little crisp and I could pick it up to eat it instead of having to use a fork and knife. We visited 30 minutes before close but everything was available and staff were ready to take our order

name: colin brandes
text: The pizza is great and they make it right in front of you. I have a food allergy and they made sure to prevent cross contamination. It is expensive but it is worth it.

text: Fun concept - subway meets brick oven pizza, but with some higher quality toppings.

name: Kathy Cusano
text: Love it!!   Been there a number of times and it's so nice to pick out all the toppings for your own pizza.  Nice thin crust & great selections of toppings.

name: Jodi Eaves
text: For fast pizza it's really good! Would give 5 stars but the ordering process is klunky and it takes a while to get through the line. Seems like ordering could be easier and faster.

text: My family and I really enjoyed our personal pizzas from Blaze. Staff was friendly and the toppings were fresh.

text: Pizza was good but felt very rushed while building my pie. I'll give it another try in the future to see if the service improves

text: I love Blaze, it's such a good concept but this time I had to ask for a fresh bin of olives because of my onion allergy and someone else had to ask for a fresh bin because of kosher rules. So their cleanliness was not the best. I still would recommend the place as a whole though.

text: Fast friendly service great food

text: Pizza was great and cheap for 12" at just $9 for all the toppings you want. Was really awesome that everyone could get thier own stylized pizza that they wanted. Servers were nice and pizza was made to order fresh and super fast, they also gave military discounts. Would highly recommend!

text: Pizza was great, affordable and made fresh.  The ladies room floor was quite dirty.  I noticed specifically because there wasn't a purse hook in either stall and didn't want to place my purse on the floor.  Will definitely go back, just won't be using the rest room.

name: Ben N
text: for the  Size of the pizza it's not worth it. so many better  Pizza places in  Clifton Park better then blaze pizza. and not always the most friendly of stuff. must be poor Management.

text: Great pizza and fully customizable for like $9. Makes pizza places look like garbage cause they can do it better and with a fast-casual style similar to chipotle.  I would have liked thicker crust but I guess that's part of the minutes-long oven time. Pretty quirky place that I could get behind if I got more pizza in the future

name: Jim Bird
text: This my third visit to Blaze and I'll be back again soon. The crust is crisp, the sauce somewhat sweet, and the toppings are terrific! We are telling our friends that they should come with us next time.
